src: [start] ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . Can I help you ? RC : Hello ARI , actually , it 's midday and I 'd like to go to the restaurant , what time does it open ? [MASK] ARI : At 11 AM . [MASK] RC : 11 AM , thank you . And , where is it ? Where should I go ? Is it upstairs or on the ground floor ? [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] RC : Thank you ARI . [MASK] ARI : You 're welcome . ARI : How can I help you ? LP : Where can we eat at lunchtime ? [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . You can order hot or cold sandwiches as well as hot or cold drinks . [MASK] LP : It 's ... yes , yes . I did n't quite understand . ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . RC : I 'm in a wheelchair , are the toilets wheelchair accessible ? @ G ( RC , get-info ( toilet ( is_accessible ) ) ) ARI : Yes , absolutely . @ AG ( RC , get-info ( toilet ( is_accessible ) ) ) RC : Thank you . @ CG ( RC , get-info ( toilet ( is_accessible ) ) )

src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . Can I help you ? LC : Do you want to go to the toilet ? @ G ( LC , go-to ( toilet ) ) RP : Oh yes . And it 's urgent . @ G ( LC+RP , go-to ( toilet ) ) ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . It 's the second door on the right . @ AG ( LC+RP , go-to ( toilet ) ) RP : Is it for women ? @ G ( RP , go-to ( toilet ( for_women ) ) ) ARI : Yes . @ AG ( RP , go-to ( toilet ( for_women ) ) ) [start] RP : Thanks . [MASK] ARI : Thank you . RP : Oh , well , I 'd love to . [MASK] RP : What 's good on your menu ? [MASK] ARI : Lunch will be offered at midday if you have afternoon appointments . A snack may be offered after your appointment with the nurse . [MASK] RP : But what if I have an appointment in the morning ? ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . RP : So we do n't eat , we are n't offered breakfast ? [MASK] ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . RP : Well , thanks anyway . ARI : Thank you very much . src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? RC : I 'd like to have something with my friend who is sick . Is there a cafeteria ? @ G ( RC , go-to ( cafe ) ) [start] ARI : There are a few options available as part of your visit , and there 's also a cafeteria on the ground floor . Lunch will be offered at midday if you have afternoon appointments . A snack may be offered after your appointment with the nurse . [MASK] RC : Thank you . [MASK] ARI : Thank you . LP : Hello Mr Robot . I 'm looking for the lifts please . [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] LP : Thank you . [MASK] ARI : Thank you . RC : Hello , I 'd like to go to the cardiology department . I was told it was on the second floor . Is there a lift to get there ? To go up ? [MASK] ARI : Yes , absolutely . [MASK] RC : And can you tell me where it is please ? [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . RC : Ok , thank you . [MASK] ARI : Thank you . [end] LP : Hello , can we have something to eat here ? @ G ( LP+RC , eat ( ) ) ARI : Yes , absolutely . Lunch will be offered at midday if you have afternoon appointments . A snack may be offered after your appointment with the nurse . @ AG ( LP+RC , eat ( ) ) LP : Oh , how lucky , thank you . @ CG ( LP+RC , eat ( ) ) ARI : Thank you .

You have to go to the reception . RC : Ok , thank you . ARI : Thank you . See you soon . Have a nice day .

LP : I know I have an appointment but I do n't know what time it 's at . How can I find out my appointment time ? @ G ( LP , get-info ( appt ( time ) ) ) ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . RC : Well , firstly do you know where to find um which doctor it is , which department , which specialty . LP : Is there a reception ? @ G ( LP , go-to ( reception ) ) ARI : You 'll have several appointments with different health professionals , at least three . First , a nurse will ask you questions about your health and carry out an initial assessment of your current condition . Next , you will discuss your difficulties with a neuropsychologist who will suggest tests to assess your abilities as accurately as possible . Then , you will see a geriatrician who will summarise all this data and suggest different types of follow-up depending on your results . LP : Um , how do I know what time my appointment is ? @ G ( LP , get-info ( appt ( time ) ) ) ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . LP : Um ... And ... And where is um ... Um , I , I remember , I think it 's room 17 . But I 'm not sure .
